segments.text: I'd like to speak to Michael Baker , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , Mr . Baker is not in . May I take a message ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes.Tell him Mr.Cook called and ask him to return my call soon as he gets back .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: All right , Mr . Cook . I'll have Mr . Baker call you back as soon as he gets here .
segments.speaker: S1
